thread.title: Mr. Rogers Introduces a Group of Children to Electronic Music Pioneer Bruce Haak in 1968
thread.title_full: Mr. Rogers Introduces a Group of Children to Electronic Music Pioneer Bruce Haak in 1968

author: Lori Dorn
title: Mr. Rogers Introduces a Group of Children to Electronic Music Pioneer Bruce Haak in 1968

organizations.name: group of children to electronic music pioneer bruce haak

text:
In 1968, during the first season of the classic television show Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood , the esteemed Fred Rogers introduced an eager group of children to electronic music pioneer and composer Bruce Haack , who played a suitcase device of his own design . The children, guided by Miss Nelson , did calisthenics and sang to the strange, wonderful sounds . 

via swissmiss
